amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that owners and operators of electric transmission and distribution facilities submit management plans to the Secretary.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-186 to ensure that owners and operators of electric transmission and distribution facilities submit management plans to the Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 243 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 243 (Roll no. 314).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Carbajal.
